channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
My coder, Kaitou is busy working on a project right now and too busy to code. And i'm trying to learn to code so I don't have to rely on the coder.
I have a few problems I need help to fix. I have been googling and youtubing but still haven't found the answers.
1. How do I fix Piety and Chivarly? Well, whenever I click on either one of these two prayers, it lits up but immediately goes out. It dosnt turn on..
2. How do I fix my Ancient/lunar tele spells? The normal spells works except for the teleport ones, please help.
3. How do I add D claws and gs specs on NPCs? I "had" dragon claw spec working on NPCs before, but it only does the first damage.
4. How do I change a monster's max hit?
My server is 317.
Please help me! I'll be glad to rep.

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Feel_No_Pain Feel No Pain
item.description:
@Feel_No_Pain wrote:

My coder, Kaitou is busy working on a project right now and too busy to code. And i’m trying to learn to code so I don’t have to rely on the coder.

I have a few problems I need help to fix. I have been googling and youtubing but still haven’t found the answers.

  1. How do I fix Piety and Chivarly?
    Well, whenever I click on either one of these two prayers, it lits up but immediately goes out. It dosnt turn on…

  2. How do I fix my Ancient/lunar tele spells?
    The normal spells works except for the teleport ones, please help.

  3. How do I add D claws and gs specs on NPCs?
    I “had” dragon claw spec working on NPCs before, but it only does the first damage.

  4. How do I change a monster’s max hit?

My server is 317.

Please help me! I’ll be glad to rep.
